```{r echo=FALSE}
library(magrittr)

resfams_summary <- params$resfams_summary
resfams_gff <- params$resfams_gff
```

#### Resfams database

These elements were annotated from the [Resfams database](http://www.dantaslab.org/resfams/). This database contains genes related to antibiotic resistance genes as well as genes related to environmental stress resistance.

* Files:
    * GFF: ``r resfams_gff``
    * Summary table: ``r resfams_summary``

Summary table overview:

```{r echo=FALSE, comment="", eval=TRUE}
df <- read.delim(params$resfams_summary, header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
df
```
